Package com.netflix.zuul.context

Class Summary
ContextLifecycleFilter Manages Zuul RequestContext lifecycle.
Debug Simple wrapper class around the RequestContext for setting and managing Request level Debug data.
RequestContext The Request Context holds request, response, state information and data for ZuulFilters to access and share.
